snippet: New CDs include Jesse Davis’s “Live at Smalls”; Bobby Womack’s “Bravest Man in the Universe”; Jesse Stacken’s “Bagatelles for Trio”; and “The Cyrus Chestnut Quartet.”
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews Live at Smalls CD from alto saxophonist Jesse Davis, The Cyrus Chestnut Quartet album from Cyrus Chestnut, Jesse Stacken recording, Bagatelles for Trio, and The Bravest Man in the Universe by Bobby Womack.
lead_paragraph: New CDs include Jesse Davis’s “Live at Smalls”; Bobby Womack’s “Bravest Man in the Universe”; Jesse Stacken’s “Bagatelles for Trio”; and “The Cyrus Chestnut Quartet.”

headline.seo: New CDs: Jesse Davis, Cyrus Chestnut, Bobby Womack
headline.main: Collaborators Dead and Very Much Alive
headline.print_headline: Collaborators Dead and Very Much Alive
